creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cap with openings around crown; crown has three-dimensional image of animal's face with smiling mouth with fangs; front of hat is black with three-dimensional cat's face; appliquéd gold symbols on sides; gold appliquéd Chinese characters on back and back flap; lined in light blue
title: Child's hat
